title: Wireless Solar Road Stud For Wisdom Road
detail:
Wisdom Road is the most heartening idea ,it will revolutionized the construction ,use and the patterns of investment for the road .So-called the Wisdom Road,which is through the special design and construct ,can wide support Twenty-one century IT technical related function on the new road.

There should have many kinds of IT technical related function ,for example ,

Insert the sensor with wireless launching function into road ,can constantly monitor and report the change status of road ;

Fix up the both-way WIFI transmitter in the middle of road,enhanced commercial boardband services for running vehicles and nearly commercial or civil building ;

Setting up the special equipment on road for electromobile,so that can reduce the requirement of roadside charging sites .

Now we develop new SOLAR ROAD STUD ,such as WIFI controlled wireless solar road stud ,Traffic light Sync wireless solar road stud ,Bluetooth Sync flash solar road stud, Wireless timing solar road stud …Can be widely used in urban main, secondary roads, commercial, factories, tourist attractions, parking and other places, which can cater to Wisdom Road.

Brian Burger ,Resident Engineer of MoDOT in America Missouri,he said ,Wisdom Road supply more new chance for road user and road operation department, these wisdom service not only can improve commuters’ travel quality ,but also can take more benefit chance for road operation department .
